channel.title: [RELEASE] Guitar Model Dean Razorback [RELEASE]
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b][u]Guitar Model[/u][/b][/size] [size=18pt]Modeled by WhitesWolves[/size]
[u]Description[/u] This is a model i made a year or so back (it was actually my third model). It is a model of the Dean Razorback Dimebag guitar (a well known and respected instrument). i personally think that it's a very nice guitar with an outstanding design, i couldn't resist and had to model it, i was still very new to 3d modeling at the time so it took me roughly 10 hours (i fond memories of that time). The only thing it lacks are:strings, whammy bar(which is not necessary). These can be easily added.
[u]Reason for releasing after all this time[/u] Well after coming across what i consider an ancient relic, i decided i should give out to all you good people. i originally planned on releasing it on a server which me and a buddy had planned, but unfortunately it wasn't made.
I hope you guys all put it to good use, i feel a little empty inside when i know this model hasn't ever been able to make it into a server.
[size=24pt][u]Problem[/u][/size] the only issue (well at least for some) is that this is a raw file saved in the format of mqo. (metasequio) it is shaped and ready to be put in-game, and if any adjustments are desired, it is possible to edit and improve it from metasequio (or other 3d modeling programs if you convert it to a different file type).
[size=24pt][u]Request[/u][/size] I would deeply appreciate it if someone took a screen shot of them wielding the guitar, it would fulfill the little hole that it has left in me, and i would i be so happy.
By the way, i originally thought this would look good mixed in with the air guitar emote. just an idea for you outstanding coders!
well enough of the chit chat, here's what the actual model looks like:
[size=24pt][u]Pictures[/u][/size]
wired: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/s5ft3p.jpg[/img]
rendered: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/107p6yc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nvb1gp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vwh2ep.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/rh4ykj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/16lk5ti.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2i8w3de.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/6joqc4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vsokjq.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt][u][b]Link[/b][/u][/size] Here's the link, i know the link url is weird, and when you go on there's some ad, but apparently you can skip it and get right to the download, it makes me 1 cent per 10 clicks, and since wildy in the real rs might come back, i thought i might save up for membership with it and play again (to remember my childhood). i'm not sure whether adding the add is against the forums policies, i'm am not sure, if so, please inform me.
*
[size=14pt]Please comment and tell me what you think[/size]
yours truly ~WhiteWolves

item.title: [RELEASE] Guitar Model Dean Razorback [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

[size=24pt]Guitar Model[/size]
[size=18pt]Modeled by WhitesWolves[/size]

Description
This is a model i made a year or so back (it was actually my third model). It is a model of the Dean Razorback Dimebag guitar (a well known and respected instrument). i personally think that it’s a very nice guitar with an outstanding design, i couldn’t resist and had to model it, i was still very new to 3d modeling at the time so it took me roughly 10 hours (i fond memories of that time). The only thing it lacks are:strings, whammy bar(which is not necessary). These can be easily added.

Reason for releasing after all this time
Well after coming across what i consider an ancient relic, i decided i should give out to all you good people. i originally planned on releasing it on a server which me and a buddy had planned, but unfortunately it wasn’t made.

I hope you guys all put it to good use, i feel a little empty inside when i know this model hasn't ever been able to make it into a server.

[size=24pt]Problem[/size]
the only issue (well at least for some) is that this is a raw file saved in the format of mqo. (metasequio) it is shaped and ready to be put in-game, and if any adjustments are desired, it is possible to edit and improve it from metasequio (or other 3d modeling programs if you convert it to a different file type).

[size=24pt]Request[/size]
I would deeply appreciate it if someone took a screen shot of them wielding the guitar, it would fulfill the little hole that it has left in me, and i would i be so happy.

By the way, i originally thought this would look good mixed in with the air guitar emote. just an idea for you outstanding coders!
